resource.description: Defines a reason for a payment. Intended to allow the APIuser to declare the reason for a transfer of funds in order to facilitate compliance checks. Used for UI presentation when creating customer-quotes and payment-instructions.

attribute.name: name
attribute.comment: The display name of the reason. Suitable for presentation to in a UI selection control.

attribute.name: description
attribute.comment: A brief description of the payment reason.

attribute.name: requires-comment
attribute.comment: True if the UI should offer user a comment field for input of additional information

url.comment: Returns a listing of all resources available to caller.
